body_html:
Hi, I used method in my model_fn provided by @GPhilo
The problem is that it will run init_from_checkpoint every time whether in TRAIN mode or EVA mode.

Is there any way to run init_from_checpoint once at the very beginning before the first train_op start?

body:
Hi, I used method in my model_fn provided by @GPhilo 
The problem is that it will run init_from_checkpoint every time whether in TRAIN mode or EVA mode.

Is there any way to run init_from_checpoint once at the very beginning before the first train_op start?
